directions: Lightly toss tomato, mozzarella cheese, and avocado cubes in a salad bowl. Mix balsamic vinegar, red wine vinegar, dried basil, sugar, salt, and black pepper in a separate bowl. Pour dressing over salad and mix again to coat.
ingredients: 3 (4 ounce) balls of fresh mozzarella cheese, cubed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Most Amazing Salad! Tomato, Mozzarella, Avocado, and Bliss
